thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Gold Rises as Treasury Yields, Dollar Stabilize

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Gold Rises as Treasury Yields, Dollar Stabilize
text:
Gold prices rose Monday, supported by muted moves in Treasury yields and the dollar.
Gold for April delivery added 0.9% to $1,327.40 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange. Prices fell last week despite a surge in stock-market volatility, with some analysts attributing the declines to investors selling gold to raise money for their bets on stocks and concerns about higher interest rates. Gold is a haven asset that some investors favor when they think markets might turn rocky.
